Question: Which statements accurately describe the relationships among the characters in 'Gigli'?
Options:
A. Brian frustrates Gigli with his insistence on going to 'the Baywatch'.
B. Gigli has feelings for Ricki.
C. Louis supports Gigli in his endeavors.
D. Gigli feels resentment towards both Louis and Ricki.
Answer: A) Brian frustrates Gigli with his insistence on going to 'the Baywatch'., B) Gigli has feelings for Ricki., D) Gigli feels resentment towards both Louis and Ricki.
